### Download a folder from this repository

It is easy to download this entire repository or one individual file directly from GitHub, but downloading a subfolder (e.g. `images_ATRIUM`) is tricky, because GitHub GUI does not enable it. Fortunately, there is a free third-party service for downloading folders from GitHub: <https://download-directory.github.io>. To download a folder from this repository, copy the URL below and replace `images_ATRIUM` with the name of the desired folder: <https://download-directory.github.io/?url=https://github.com/ufal/R_BEGINNERS_SHORT/tree/main/images_ATRIUM>.
